      • newInstance

        public static UbeeOptions newInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Returns a new UbeeOptions instance, all attributes are filled with the default value.
        Returns:
        a new UbeeOptions instance.

      • getInstance

        public static UbeeOptions getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the last used UbeeOptions. This method will recover all parameters of the last instance of UbeeOptions, if you need a clean UbeeOptions use the newInstance(android.content.Context) method instead of this.
        Returns:
        The last used UbeeOptions.
        See Also:
        newInstance(android.content.Context)

      • setDevelopmentEnvironment

        @Deprecated
public void setDevelopmentEnvironment(boolean enabled)
        Deprecated. 
        Enable the sdk development mode.

        Now this method is deprecated, use setDevelopmentDevices(String...) instead of it.

        Parameters:
        enabled - true if you want to set your app in development mode, otherwise false
        See Also:
        setDevelopmentDevices(String...)
